availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy J. Cole Smyth in Estill County, Kentucky, on August 31, 1854. Father of Sarah Smyth, Caroline Smyth, and Agatha H. Smyth. Farmer in Lee County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Estill County, Kentucky in 1860. Farmer in Estill County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Lee County, District 31, p. 352A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 270.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Millers Creek, p. 581A-B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Estill County, KY, July 1863, p. 143.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994033, Estill County Marriages, p. 3.
"George Smyth (1826-1894)," Find A Grave, Memorial #178934416, accessed December 10, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/178934416.
